summary: THE DOOR AJAR LIGHT CONTINUES TO STAY ON EVEN WHEN IT IS SHUT. THIS HAS HAPPENED FOR THE FRONT DRIVER-SIDE DOOR AND THE BACK DRIVER-SIDE DOOR. THE FRONT WAS FIXED UNDER WARRANTY. I CAN NOT AFFORD THE BACK DOOR TO BE FIXED, AND I SHOULDN'T BECAUSE THIS IS AN OBVIOUS DEFECT! THE VEHICLE IS STATIONARY AND IN MOTION WHEN THIS IS HAPPENING. I DON'T EVEN OPEN THE DOOR ANYMORE AS IT TAKES ABOUT THREE DAYS FOR THE SYSTEM TO REGISTER THAT IT IS CLOSED. BUT ONCE OPENED, THE LIGHT STAYS ON!!
